content: protect your hands from hot bowls of yummy soup with a free crochet bowl cozy pattern this easy project will be done in one hour or less a free version of the pattern are available here https //www youshouldcraft com/crochet-bowl-cozy-pattern-free **materials ** 132 yards of dishie or similar #4 worsted weight cotton yarn held double 6 0 mm crochet hook stitch marker tapestry needle scissors note the sample photos use dishie in lilac verdigris and azure **share your brooklyn bowl cozies ** if you crochet the brooklyn bowl cozy please share it with me on instagram tag me @youshouldcraft or use hashtag #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
